channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How To Easily Track And See Santa’s Sleigh And The ‘Christmas Star’
item.description: See Jupiter shining like the “Christmas Star” and catch a glimpse of the ISS — aka “Santa’s Sleigh” — in the early morning skies this Christmas Day.

item.title: iPhone 18 To See Surprise Early Release Date, New Report Claims
item.description: If you’re expecting the iPhone 18 to launch in fall 2026, a new report claims it will be much sooner, by a matter of months.

item.title: ‘Precarious’ is Wall Street’s defining word for 2026

item.title: Trump just declared Christmas Eve a national holiday. Here’s what’s open and closed?

item.title: Northern Lights Alert: Christmas Eve Could Deliver Aurora To 10 States
item.description: A NOAA forecast suggests that Northern Lights may be visible in northern U.S. states on Dec. 24 as turbulent solar wind conditions persist.

item.title: CEOs reveal their New Year’s resolutions for 2026: From 8-day bike races and AI training, to finally cracking 7 hours of sleep a night
item.description: Beyond the boardroom, CEOs are setting goalposts for their own growth. Here’s what execs are hoping to achieve in 2026.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
